column4: I tried to copy function in the console (unfortunately I only know the commands for windows Command Prompt) and it did not recognize the function copy. how would I copy the file from one area to another using the console?
and what is the command for paste?
the problem is that it is not letting me paste the file into my ect. file without premission though.
open up your editor with gksudo ex. "gksudo gedit" then you will be able to paste into it
